text: What do you value the most in the workplace?
How do you like to spend your time outside of work?
What kinds of activities drain you?
What is your biggest pet peeve?
What's something you've done, but you'll never do again??
Who did you want to be when you grow up when you were a kid?
What's something your family doesn't know about you?
What's the most awkward first date you've ever been on?
What is your fondest memory together?
What do I do that makes you smile??
